Projects

Building tools and models for the AI community

Here are some of the projects I’m working on or have contributed to. I believe in open science and sharing tools that can benefit the broader research community.

Open Source Contributions

GitHub Repositories

I maintain several open-source repositories focused on machine learning, NLP, and mathematical tools. Check out my GitHub profile for the latest projects and contributions.

View GitHub

Hugging Face Models

I develop and share machine learning models on Hugging Face, making cutting-edge AI accessible to everyone. From language models to specialized tools, explore my contributions to the ML community.

View Models

AI Research Tools

Development of tools and frameworks for AI research, including model analysis, training utilities, and evaluation frameworks. Focused on making research more efficient and reproducible.

Python PyTorch Transformers

NLP Applications

Building practical natural language processing applications, from text generation to language understanding systems. Exploring the latest techniques in transformer models and large language models.

NLP LLMs Transformers

Mathematical Computing

Tools and libraries for mathematical computation relevant to AI research. Bridging pure mathematics and machine learning through computational approaches.

NumPy SciPy Algebra

Experiment Tracking

Development of tools for tracking and analyzing machine learning experiments. Making research more reproducible and results more interpretable.

MLOps Visualization Analysis

Research Software

My research often involves developing specialized software for specific problems. While not all of this code is publicly available (some is still under active research), I strive to make tools available whenever possible.

Areas of Focus

  • Deep Learning Frameworks: Custom architectures and training pipelines
  • NLP Tools: Text processing, tokenization, and language model utilities
  • Mathematical Software: Computational algebra and geometry tools
  • Data Analysis: Tools for analyzing and visualizing research data
  • Reproducibility: Scripts and configs for reproducing research results

Collaboration Opportunities

I’m always interested in collaborating on interesting projects! If you have an idea for a project that combines AI, mathematics, or both, I’d love to hear about it.

Current interests for collaboration:

  • Large language model applications
  • Mathematical foundations of machine learning
  • Open-source AI tools
  • Educational resources for AI and mathematics

Feel free to reach out if you’d like to discuss potential collaborations!
